 Frequently Asked Questions

 How old is Kirk Cousins?
 Kirk Cousins is 37 years old.
 When was Kirk Cousins born?
 Kirk Cousins was born on August 19, 1988.
 Where was Kirk Cousins born?
 Kirk Cousins was born in Barrington, IL.
 How tall is Kirk Cousins?
 Kirk Cousins is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.
 How much does Kirk Cousins weigh?
 Kirk Cousins weighs 205 lbs (92 kg).
 How many games does Kirk Cousins play?
 Kirk Cousins played 164 games over his career.
 How many passing yards does Kirk Cousins have?
 Kirk Cousins had 42,979 passing yards over his career.
 How many touchdowns does Kirk Cousins have?
 Kirk Cousins had 288 touchdowns over his career.
 How many Super Bowls has Kirk Cousins won?
 Kirk Cousins has never won a Super Bowl.
 What is Kirk Cousins' Instagram account?
 Kirk Cousins is on Instagram at kirkcousins.
 What are Kirk Cousins' nicknames?
 Captain Kirk, Kirktober, Kirko Chainz are nicknames for Kirk Cousins.

 Larry Fitzgerald is 42 years old.
 When was Larry Fitzgerald born?
 Larry Fitzgerald was born on August 31, 1983.
 Where was Larry Fitzgerald born?
 Larry Fitzgerald was born in Minneapolis, MN.
 How tall is Larry Fitzgerald?
 Larry Fitzgerald is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.
 How much did Larry Fitzgerald weigh when playing?
 Larry Fitzgerald weighed 218 lbs (98 kg) when playing.

 Larry Fitzgerald has not been elected into the Hall of Fame.

 Larry Fitzgerald played 263 games over his career.

 Larry Fitzgerald had 1,432 receptions over his career.

 Larry Fitzgerald had 17,492 receiving yards over his career.

 Larry Fitzgerald has never won a Super Bowl.

 Larry Fitzgerald last played in 2020.

 Larry Fitzgerald is on Instagram at larryfitzgerald.

 Frequently Asked Questions

 How old is Edgerrin James?
 Edgerrin James is 47 years old.
 When was Edgerrin James born?
 Edgerrin James was born on August 1, 1978.
 Where was Edgerrin James born?
 Edgerrin James was born in Immokalee, FL.
 How tall is Edgerrin James?
 Edgerrin James is 6-0 (183 cm) tall.
 How much did Edgerrin James weigh when playing?
 Edgerrin James weighed 219 lbs (99 kg) when playing.
 Is Edgerrin James in the Hall of Fame?
 Edgerrin James was elected into the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2020.
 How many games did Edgerrin James play?
 Edgerrin James played 148 games over his career.
 How many rushing attempts did Edgerrin James have?
 Edgerrin James had 3,028 rushing attempts over his career.
 How many rushing yards did Edgerrin James have?
 Edgerrin James had 12,246 rushing yards over his career.
 How many Super Bowls has Edgerrin James won?
 Edgerrin James has never won a Super Bowl.
 When did Edgerrin James retire?
 Edgerrin James last played in 2009.
 What are Edgerrin James' nicknames?
 Edge is a nickname for Edgerrin James.

 Frequently Asked Questions

 How old is Philip Rivers?
 Philip Rivers is 43 years old.
 When was Philip Rivers born?
 Philip Rivers was born on December 8, 1981.
 Where was Philip Rivers born?
 Philip Rivers was born in Decatur, AL.
 How tall is Philip Rivers?
 Philip Rivers is 6-5 (196 cm) tall.
 How much did Philip Rivers weigh when playing?
 Philip Rivers weighed 228 lbs (103 kg) when playing.
 Is Philip Rivers in the Hall of Fame?
 Philip Rivers has not been elected into the Hall of Fame.
 How many games did Philip Rivers play?
 Philip Rivers played 244 games over his career.
 How many passing yards did Philip Rivers have?
 Philip Rivers had 63,440 passing yards over his career.
 How many touchdowns did Philip Rivers have?
 Philip Rivers had 421 touchdowns over his career.
 How many Super Bowls has Philip Rivers won?
 Philip Rivers has never won a Super Bowl.
 When did Philip Rivers retire?
 Philip Rivers last played in 2020.

 Frequently Asked Questions

 How old is Matt Ryan?
 Matt Ryan is 40 years old.
 When was Matt Ryan born?
 Matt Ryan was born on May 17, 1985.
 Where was Matt Ryan born?
 Matt Ryan was born in Exton, PA.
 How tall is Matt Ryan?
 Matt Ryan is 6-4 (193 cm) tall.
 How much did Matt Ryan weigh when playing?
 Matt Ryan weighed 217 lbs (98 kg) when playing.
 Is Matt Ryan in the Hall of Fame?
 Matt Ryan has not been elected into the Hall of Fame.
 How many games did Matt Ryan play?
 Matt Ryan played 234 games over his career.
 How many passing yards did Matt Ryan have?
 Matt Ryan had 62,792 passing yards over his career.
 How many touchdowns did Matt Ryan have?
 Matt Ryan had 381 touchdowns over his career.
 How many Super Bowls has Matt Ryan won?
 Matt Ryan has never won a Super Bowl.
 When did Matt Ryan retire?
 Matt Ryan last played in 2022.
 What is Matt Ryan's Instagram account?
 Matt Ryan is on Instagram at ryan_matt02.
 What are Matt Ryan's nicknames?
 Matty Ice is a nickname for Matt Ryan.

 Frequently Asked Questions

 How old is Ben Roethlisberger?
 Ben Roethlisberger is 43 years old.
 When was Ben Roethlisberger born?
 Ben Roethlisberger was born on March 2, 1982.
 Where was Ben Roethlisberger born?
 Ben Roethlisberger was born in Lima, OH.
 How tall is Ben Roethlisberger?
 Ben Roethlisberger is 6-5 (196 cm) tall.
 How much did Ben Roethlisberger weigh when playing?
 Ben Roethlisberger weighed 240 lbs (108 kg) when playing.
 Is Ben Roethlisberger in the Hall of Fame?
 Ben Roethlisberger has not been elected into the Hall of Fame.
 How many games did Ben Roethlisberger play?
 Ben Roethlisberger played 249 games over his career.
 How many passing yards did Ben Roethlisberger have?
 Ben Roethlisberger had 64,088 passing yards over his career.
 How many touchdowns did Ben Roethlisberger have?
 Ben Roethlisberger had 418 touchdowns over his career.
 How many Super Bowls has Ben Roethlisberger won?
 Ben Roethlisberger has won 2 Super Bowls.
 When did Ben Roethlisberger retire?
 Ben Roethlisberger last played in 2021.
 What are Ben Roethlisberger's nicknames?
 Big Ben is a nickname for Ben Roethlisberger.
